entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 97 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 after midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
